fields.name: Orange Cosmo
fields.description: Embark on an intergalactic adventure with our handcrafted Cosmo. Each little extraterrestrial is lovingly crafted with vibrant, soft yarn, making them both huggable and out-of-this-world cute!

fields.name: Gray Dolphin
fields.description: Dive into the magic of the ocean with our enchanting Crochet Dolphin! Handcrafted with soft yarn, this adorable plushie brings the joy and wonder of marine life right into your arms. Perfect for ocean lovers of all ages!

fields.name: Orange/White Mood Octopus
fields.description: Experience double the delight with our Mood Octopus! Flip between its vibrant colors to match your mood, whether you're feeling sunny and bright or cool and calm. Handcrafted with love and adorned with cheerful tentacles, it's the perfect cuddly companion for expressing your ever-changing emotions.

fields.name: Rainbow Hat
fields.description: Embrace winter with flair in this snugly crocheted hat, meticulously crafted to keep you toasty while exuding timeless charm with its intricate stitches and classic design.

fields.name: Two-Tone Gray Scarf
fields.description: Stay cozy and stylish with this handcrafted crochet scarf, intricately woven to keep you warm in the chilliest of days while adding a pop of color and texture to your ensemble.
